law.history: Repealed 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 137, sec. 3, effective March 27, 1984. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 217, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 147, sec. 1, effective March 28, 1978. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 93, sec. 6, effective July 1, 1977.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Procedure for increasing tax rate to maximum support of power equalization -- Substitution of revenue from permissive taxes to qualify for matching funds where tax rate not sufficient.
